    <metadata>

          <identifier>

            <entry>40dac97a-6e44-4066-2cc1-afa4d0f8cd23#1#4</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Reims, Notre-Dame székesegyház</string>
            <string language="en">Reims, the cathedral of Notre-Dame</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reims, die Kathedrale von Notre-Notre-Dame</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Reims, la cathédrale du Notre-notre-Dame</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reims, a catedral do Notre-notre-Dame</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Reims, la cattedrale del Notre-notre-Dame</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Ρεημς, ο καθεδρικός ναός της νοτρε-κυρίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reims, la catedral de la Notre-Dama</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Reims, Notre-Dame székesegyház, északi homlokzat, Utolsó ítélet-kapu, timpanon, 1241 k.</string>
            <string language="en">Reims, the cathedral of Notre-Dame, northern front, Doomsday-gate,tympanon, 1241 k.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">timpanon,  13. század,  Reims,  gótika,  gótikus művészet,  </string>
            <string language="en">tympanon,  13. century,  Reims,  ghotic,  ghotic art, </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reims, die Kathedrale von Notre-Notre-Dame, 
Nordfrontseite, Tag des Jüngsten Gerichts-gate, tympanon, k 1241.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Reims, la cathédrale du Notre-notre-Dame, avant 
nordique, jour du Jugement dernier-gate, tympanon, k 1241.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reims, a catedral do Notre-notre-Dame, parte 
dianteira do norte, Doomsday-porta, tympanon, k 1241.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Reims, la cattedrale del Notre-notre-Dame, parte 
anteriore nordica, Doomsday-cancello, tympanon, K 1241.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Ρεημς, ο καθεδρικός ναός της νοτρε-κυρίας, βόρειο 
μέτωπο, Ημέρα της Κρίσεως-πύλη, tympanon, 1241 Κ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reims, la catedral de la Notre-Dama, frente 
norteño, Doomsday-puerta, tympanon, k 1241.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">tympanon, 13. Jahrhundert, Reims, ghotic, ghotic kunst,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">tympanon, 13. siècle, Reims, art ghotic et ghotic,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tympanon, 13. século, Reims, arte ghotic, ghotic,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tympanon, 13. secolo, Reims, arte ghotic e ghotic,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">tympanon, 13, αιώνας, Reims, ghotic, ghotic 
τέχνη,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">tympanon, 13. siglo, Reims, arte ghotic, ghotic,</string>
          </keyword>
